entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't hardcode .NET Framework test projects in helix submission #44490

Closed

  • [WebToolsE2E] The minimum VS version required in .NET 9 is 17.8.3. #44204

PullRequests

Created

  • Default sign to false for all SB legs #44489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix .NET Framework test helix submission #44481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run MoveDotNetBuildLogs target even when the repo build fails #44480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Updated

  • [ADD] dotnet solution migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [Draft] Adding --format support to `dotnet new list` #44140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Outline of CLI UX/Option/behavior expectations for the dotnet CLI #43938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove additional TL characters from the dotnet run output special casing for tests #44442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet-format: Support hidden severity for analyzers and code fixes #43929
    untriaged, Area-Format
